title: 1.3 Master Challenge 1
question: Write a pseudocode and JavaScript program to convert a value of temperature from Fahrenheit to Degrees Celsius. Ask the user to input the temperature. Convert the temperature and display the result.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
